root.sum: SumaryThe amount of sort product specified in the sidebar is diferent from the proposed on the page
root.description:
Description Preconditions Launch Google Chrom Go to https://rozetka.com.ua
Steps to reproduce Press the <Каталог> button. Select category <Ноутбуки и компьютеры> click on link <Ноутбуки> or click on picture above link. choose in the sidebar <Huawai (12)
Actual result the page with 11 offers of the Huawai laptop open. Attachments"" Expected result the page with 12 offers of the Huawai laptop opens.
